nodes.text: The Asteroid Belt was a cantina located on Gorse, a planet of the Inner Rim. It was ran by Okadiah Garson, foreman for one of the thorilide mining teams on the moon Cynda. Although the food served there was subpar, The Asteroid Belt was favored by many of Garson's own employees. The cantina was situated in the Gorse City district known as "the Pits", next to a flophouse also owned by Garson.
